title: How Leaders Can Create a Purpose-Driven Culture - HBR.org Daily
summary: Companies are increasingly emphasizing a corporate purpose beyond mere profitability; this integration hinges on organizational culture. Leaders need to exemplify and articulate the company’s values; employees must perceive their roles as contributing to this purpose. Recognizing and rewarding behaviors that align with a company’s purpose solidifies this culture.

title: Casio to release Charles Darwin Foundation collaboration G-SHOCK watches - Japan Today
summary: Casio Computer Co Ltd has released new G-SHOCK watches in collaboration with the Charles Darwin Foundation. The watches feature designs incorporating silhouettes of creatures that live in the Galapagos Islands and are made with bio-based resin produced using renewable organic resources. A portion of the proceeds will be used to support the Charles Darwin Foundation’s conservation activities.

title: Mountain Partnership: News detail - Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
summary: The International Network for Bamboo and Rattan (INBAR) is an intergovernmental organization that promotes environmentally sustainable development using bamboo and rattan. Bamboo and rattan offer versatile nature-based solutions to challenges like climate change mitigation and adaptation, poverty alleviation, job creation, environmental conservation, green trade and resilient construction. INBAR has made a real difference in the lives of millions of people and environments by promoting sustainable management practices for bamboo and rattan resources through strategic and adaptive research and development.
green_innovation: TRUE, because both bamboo and rattan offer versatile nature-based solutions to many pressing global challenges, such as climate change mitigation and adaptation, poverty alleviation, job creation, environmental conservation, green trade and resilient construction.
business_innovation: TRUE, because bamboo and rattan can be used to create a wide range of new or improved products and processes, such as bamboo cutlery, chopsticks, bowls, packaging and other durable products like flooring, furniture, construction materials and more.
green_product: TRUE, because bamboo and rattan are both renewable resources that can be used to create products that are more sustainable than traditional products made from other materials, such as plastic or wood.
green_process: TRUE, because bamboo and rattan can be used to create processes that are more sustainable than traditional processes, such as using bamboo to create a more sustainable building material.
company: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan (INBAR)
official_company_name: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan (INBAR)
greenwashing: FALSE, because both bamboo and rattan offer real environmental benefits and INBAR helps to ensure that these products are made according to sustainable standards

title: New tangle bins for popular Darwin, Palmerston fishing spots - NT Independent
summary: OzFish Unlimited and the Amateur Fishermen's Association NT (AFANT) are installing tangle bins in popular fishing spots around Darwin and Palmerston to reduce fishing waste and promote recycling. Fishers can dispose of discarded fishing gear in the bins, and OzFish will recycle the collected materials. The project aims to keep waterways clean and protect marine life.
green_innovation: TRUE, the project contributes to environmental sustainability by reducing fishing waste and promoting recycling.
business_innovation: TRUE, the tangle bins are a new and improved way to collect and recycle discarded fishing gear.
green_product: FALSE, the article does not describe a specific green product.
green_process: TRUE, the process of collecting and recycling discarded fishing gear reduces environmental impacts by diverting waste from landfills and promoting the use of recycled materials.

title: Retail India News: Clensta Unveils Innovative Eggstreme Range - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita have launched the 'Scars are Beautiful' campaign to celebrate the beauty of postpartum bodies and stretch marks. The campaign features 11 mothers who proudly display their bodies and share their motherhood experiences to inspire other women to embrace their bodies and change societal perceptions of beauty. The campaign aims to promote self-love, body positivity, and inclusivity for all women.
